website_summaries.verdict: Natural cleaning solution that ships in a concentrated form, so it's giving you a good value.
pros: Works well on nearly any hard surface in your home, including floors
Use it diluted for general cleaning and undiluted for tough soils and grime
Has a lavender scent that some people will love
cons: Some people will find the scent overpowering
Will leave a film on some surfaces

customer_reviews.title: "BEST CLEANER EVER"
customer_reviews.text: I already purchased and uses the spray version of this cleaner and love the way it cleans and sanitize's everything. This cleaner i use to wash floors and clean other areas that it is hard to reach with the spray version.It only takes 2 tablespoons to 5 liters of water to clean efficently and sanitize everything. I am so happy to find this natural cleaner here on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using it from the time our second baby was born. Before I didn’t really know what to use to clean he floor where the baby is almost for the whole time, especially when starts crawling all around. For our first baby we used only water but it was not always sufficient. Since I found frosch, I love it and I use only these products to clean the whole house. Our 3 little kids can play on the floor shortly after it dries, it’s clean and not covered with too many chemicals unlike when using other detergents. And the scent is great!
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna M.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great - Smells Great - Very pleasant odor which does not bother me.
customer_reviews.text: I am very much impressed with Frosch Natural All Purpose. I had never heard of this before and actually just ran across it look at different cleaners on Amazon. I am very sensitive to the various chemical in cleaners but this one does not bother me at all. It clean very well and has a very pleasant smell. I highly recommend this and will continue to use it in place of all of the other cleaners i have.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Mrs Meyers dish soap gets my house much ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok.... Not great. Mrs Meyers dish soap gets my house much cleaner and smells better. This stuff smells good though, wanted it for the bathroom for it's disinfectant properties but I'll stick with my old routine.
customer_reviews.author: PyrettaBlaze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great - just need a little bit - smells great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells So Good
customer_reviews.text: Frosch Natural Lavender Cleaner smells so good & does not irritate my sinus & bronchial tube. It does a terrific job in keeping the toilets clean. I pour some in the toilet brush holder, with some water, and it keeps the toilets clean after “heavy” 😷 uses.
customer_reviews.author: KimBar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, love this whole line of products, smells so good and cleans so well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super eco friendly fo real
customer_reviews.text: happy to find this German product so eco friendly ( and efficient ). The German codes to get organic products certification labels is one of the most strict in the world. every daily little actions (by using eco friendly product validated ) can change our future
customer_reviews.author: Merienne Cyrille

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, smells fantastic, and great value as it is very concentrated :)
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Great natural cleaning concentrate
customer_reviews.text: I love the Frosch product line! Just the best products. I prefer the neutral PH cleaner concentrate but this stuff is also pretty terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: we use this thing for everything.
customer_reviews.text: these are working great. they smell nice and works. we use this for everything and it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Gokou

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love Frosch All Purpose Cleaner! My first time using it was at my daughter’s new home, a few years back, which needed cleaning. It is amazing at how quickly it gets rid of stains and grime & the lavender smell is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Linlin 1st

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of lavender, as opposed to chemical smells, and this is all natural, smells good, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Aunt

customer_reviews.title: really pleased with the Frosch products
customer_reviews.text: this was a reorder . really pleased with the Frosch products. Always look for more natural alternatives.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Cleaning for Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: The Frosch Natural Lavender Universal All Purpose Cleaner arrived in good condition. I look forward to using it to clean my apartment for a safe clean in the very near future!
customer_reviews.author: Doll Face

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all purpose cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful cleans great and is much better for the environment than other cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: Anke Krueger

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love the Frosch cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the Frosch cleaning products. The lavendar and baking soda are amazing cleaners. My only complaint is the bottle of the toilet bowl cleaner keeps breaking in me.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl d.

customer_reviews.title: Weak lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent not strong enough and cleans okay, but I would not order again - it is not as good as GREAT BRITAIN’s Fairy cleaning dish soap
customer_reviews.author: April J Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Works great in removing pet odors in the washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scent. Works great in removing pet odors in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous smelling product
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a wonderful fragrance this excellent cleaning product has! It smells so great, it almost makes me look forward to cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: cephalopod adorer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and natural cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scent and works well on "Pergo" type flooring as well as tile for master bedroom/bath area! Will last quite awhile as just need a capful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended by someone who works at a pet training facility ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Frosch Natural Lavender Cleaner for the first time. Was recommended by someone who works at a pet training facility in Orlando, FL. I needed an all purpose cleaner that was pet friendly because I just got a puppy. I love the lavender scent.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Burtrem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday. I will keep purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: 789DEA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like myers cleaners much more than this product. I will not purchase again. :(
customer_reviews.author: laura Hoffman-Martin

customer_reviews.title: Frosch Lavender
customer_reviews.text: Delightful fragrance and an excellent cleaner of our hardwood hickory flooring!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Harren

customer_reviews.title: more like a cleaning agent than herbal
customer_reviews.text: The smell is way too strong...more like a cleaning agent than herbal...will give away...very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Well formulated, Smells Delightful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product line. I love the clean, fresh smell, not fake and overwhelming, smells like pure lavender. It's concentrated, add water and everything sparkles and makes me enjoy cleaning again.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzysierra

customer_reviews.title: Love them all
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding products! Love them all! Would appreciate it if we could get lavender in all the Frosch products, a wonderful option to the lemon, which also leaves an awesome, fresh clean! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gski

customer_reviews.title: that's good!
customer_reviews.text: works well on my floors.. smell not strong, that's good!
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding. Fields of lavender in my living room as ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Fields of lavender in my living room as I clean the surfaces floor, woodwork. I am transported to Provence!!!
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Princess

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special! I think the scent is very artificial. I will go back to using Mrs Meyers clean day lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny54

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad seller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it arrived with an already expired date on it. I messaged the seller, but they didn't respond. I had already opened and used to clean my floors before I even checked the date, so I couldn't return it. I love the product for cleaning the floors since it smells nice, cleans well, and is eco friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Jared A Markham

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. Makes my house shine
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. Makes my house shine! Unbelievably, my house seems to stay cleaner longer; the faucets shine all week without leaving water spots. You only use such a tiny bit with water that I wondered how it would really clean, but it does a spectacular job. I use 1.25 teaspoons in 1 liter of water, and that spray bottle lasts for weeks. I would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Lover

customer_reviews.title: The food drippings of 2 hams and 8 pans of assorted pasta and meats were easily dispersed. The hard crusted bottom only needed a
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through grease with ease. My ovens were a disaster after Christmas for 25 family members. Spread a thin layer of full strength on the bottom of both and let is stand for 10 to 15 minutes. The food drippings of 2 hams and 8 pans of assorted pasta and meats were easily dispersed. The hard crusted bottom only needed a little steel wool. This product is an essential item in my cleaning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mc

customer_reviews.title: I use this cleaner everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner and use it absolutely everywhere. Every room gets a dose of it, the slight lavender scent smells fantastic and it does a wonderful cleaning job. Plus, it's safe for the environment and safe around my cats. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Winesalot

customer_reviews.title: Like Fabuloso.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good cleaner and really universal as promised. But I think that the synthetic lavender smell is too strong and heavy. It makes me sick. Feels like a product similar to Fabuloso and not at all Green. It even has a very similar color and the bottle is not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite floor cleaner, it packs a punch for being a natural cleaner. The Lavender smell is wonderful and not a fake chemical smell. I use this for counters in a spray bottle or when mopping, it works great for daily cleaning without the negative side effects of harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: All the frosch cleaners are light smelling and clean great. You should really give it a try
customer_reviews.text: I clean houses for a living and have allergies. Any cleaner with alot of chemicals or lots of smell gives me a flare up. All the frosch cleaners are light smelling and clean great. You should really give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: No Animal Testing! No Bad Chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It is the first cleaner I have found that cleans the bathroom floors and wood floors. I have Brazilian Cherry real wood floors and they have never look better!
customer_reviews.author: CJ1042

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time Works really well Not too strong of a fragrance Very clean product as it does not leave any residual behind...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Have smelled better
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. However, I have used other lavender scented products that are more fragrant.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyLittleThing

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product. Smells great. Cleans great. It has done wonders on my wood floors. I use it on my granite counters, as well (then buff lightly with a soft cloth). I would not hesitate to recommend this cleaner to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Deming

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Leave a fesh smell and super at cleaning your house. Uses minimum effort to clean. I love the smell and the dirt that come up after the first wipe. A must for leaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rogers Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it's out of stock!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good cleaner that's Pleasing to smell!
customer_reviews.author: The Surfer

customer_reviews.title: Not Overpowering scent
customer_reviews.text: I finally tried this on my cooktop. I just poured it on straight and wiped the grease and all off with a paper towel. It was fast and did not leave a lingering scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kar-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fresh scent and great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Particularly great smell. Used it for oven cleaning and it's so much less caustic. I am not afraid to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Order and Reorder. Fragrance has never been overwhelming. ...
customer_reviews.text: Order and Reorder . Fragrance has never been overwhelming. Cleans.
customer_reviews.author: cbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell. Not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smell. Not overpowering. I love that it's biodegradable but still does it's job to clean and sanitize without harsh chemicals. Good job Germany!
customer_reviews.author: Jelewis

customer_reviews.title: A Healthy Clean
customer_reviews.text: Frosch excels in producing cleaning products without negative effects on humans, pets, or the environment. This is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell and great cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to cleaner now. Pleasant smell and great cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: M.L. CABA

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: A great all natural cleaner! Leaves no residue. Smells great. One of our favorite cleaners and we'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Hartung

customer_reviews.title: Smells good; Leaves film on tile floors.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and the idea of this product. However, it leaves a film on our shiny tile floors and really doesn't clean better than vinegar and blue Dawn.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Parette

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it cleans the floors...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it cleans my floors but wish it worked on rust and mildew
customer_reviews.author: BA Benton

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cleaning products!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best cleaning products I have ever used! Makes my bathroom sparkling clean and leaves it with a fresh, clean lavender scent.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Grandmommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaner ..love the smell and its not so harsh
customer_reviews.author: Melanie J.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased! Cleans well and leaves a fresh lavender small
customer_reviews.text: It's the second time I buy it! I'm very pleased! Cleans well and leaves a fresh lavender small!
customer_reviews.author: Elena MMM

customer_reviews.title: They are the best cleaners and environmentally friendly to boot
customer_reviews.text: Growing up in Germany, I am thrilled that Frosch products have finally arrived in the U.S. They are the best cleaners and environmentally friendly to boot. The products arrived securely packed and with record speed. Bravo Venture Housewares for bringing Frosch here.
customer_reviews.author: esther mandelbaum

customer_reviews.title: FROSCH cleaning products are the best I have found in the market
customer_reviews.text: FROSCH cleaning products are the best I have found in the market, they are very effective and they are green.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rivas-Loria

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great floor cleaner. Does not leave a residue like most which is a huge plus! Leaves floors smelling and looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy on the hands, smells nice also. Good job on toilets also.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great as an all-purpose cleaner without all the harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Works great as an all-purpose cleaner without all the harsh chemicals. This will not take out the dark color from dirt out of floor grout. Only harsh chemicals (bleach, lye, etc) can do that.
customer_reviews.author: LL

product_meta.title: Frosch Natural Lavender Universal All Purpose Cleaner Concentrate, 750 ml (Pack of 2)
feature_bullets: Concentrated cleaning solution can be combined with water for regular all-purpose cleaning, or applied directly to stains for more powerful dissolving.
Cleaning and sanitizing of floors and most washable surfaces in the household.
Powerful formula with lavender removes grease and dirt with reliable and residue-free cleaning. Removes unpleasant odors and leaves a pleasant, fresh lavender scent.
EU Ecolabel certified, 100% vegan formula, never tested on animals

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
